title: Latest figures show millions benefitting from Treasury coronavirus support schemes
description: New figures on the UK-wide government support schemes for individuals and businesses have been published today, Tuesday 19 May 2020.
datasetNotes: On the landing page under documents click on the link Covid Business Lending Data
sizingNotes: 4 tabs with a simple table structure.  Table 1 is not required as this is a summary and is included as a running total in the other 3 Tables.
